Positions.PlacementDescriptionHtml:
Full-Stack games developer in C# (.NET Core and Unity) on the mobile title ‘LEGO® Star Wars™ Battles’.

I was personally responsible for the creation and release of the servers and databases for clans and leaderboards.

Gameplay programmer in C# (Unity) on the mobile title ‘LEGO® Star Wars™ Battles’.

When I first joined the team, I worked primarily on gameplay. I created the data delivery mechanisms, configuration system, unit AI.

I also created helpful tools for saved game data management, profile management, and network debugging.
